blogPost.excerpt: Railz is the only Data as a Service platform that connects, normalizes and analyzes financial data from accounting service providers. We do this to make financing decisions faster, better and easier for Financial Institutions.
blogPost.body: Railz is the only Data as a Service platform that connects, normalizes and analyzes financial data from accounting service providers. We do this to make financing decisions faster, better and easier for Financial Institutions.
blogPost.title: Railz - Build Financial SME apps using normalized Accounting data
blogPost.author: Sohaib Zahid

localize.description: Railz是唯一一个数据即服务的平台，可以连接、规范和分析来自会计服务供应商的财务数据。我们这样做是为了让金融机构更快、更好、更轻松地做出融资决策。
localize.tagline: 使用规范化会计数据构建金融中小企业应用

localize.description: Railz是唯一一個數據即服務的平臺，可以連接、規範和分析來自會計服務供應商的財務數據。我們這樣做是爲了讓金融機構更快、更好、更輕鬆地做出融資決策。
localize.tagline: 使用規範化會計數據構建金融中小企業應用

previous.excerpt: Rejoy Health is a subscription service for the 20M people with Thyroid Disorder in the US. Rejoy Health members pay a monthly fee for treatment, symptom management & lifestyle coaching.
previous.title: Rejoy Health - Digital clinic to treat and manage thyroid disorders

localize.description: Rejoy Health 是一项针对美国 2000 万甲状腺疾病患者的订阅服务。Rejoy Health 的会员每月支付治疗、症状管理和生活方式指导的费用。
localize.tagline: 治疗和管理甲状腺疾病的数字诊所

localize.description: Rejoy Health 是一項針對美國 2000 萬甲狀腺疾病患者的訂閱服務。Rejoy Health 的會員每月支付治療、症狀管理和生活方式指導的費用。
localize.tagline: 治療和管理甲狀腺疾病的數字診所

next.excerpt: Voice Recorder Pro is designed to meet all your recording needs and help you work efficiently, including Audio Recording, Playback, Management, Sharing, Editing, and more. Let everything be in perfect order.
next.title: Voice Recorder Pro - The easiest voice recorder and choice of 60 millions users

localize.description: 录音机专业版的设计可以满足你所有的录音需求，帮助你高效的工作，包括音频录制、播放、管理、共享、编辑等。让一切都变得完美有序。
localize.tagline: 最简单的语音记录器，6000万用户的选择。

localize.description: 錄音機專業版的設計可以滿足你所有的錄音需求，幫助你高效的工作，包括音頻錄製、播放、管理、共享、編輯等。讓一切都變得完美有序。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的語音記錄器，6000萬用戶的選擇。
